ch.nolix.element.GUI

Class Area

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.core.entity.Entity<E>
      • ch.nolix.element.core.Element<MU>
        • ch.nolix.element.core.MutableElement<ONE>
          • ch.nolix.element.bases.OptionalNamableElement<CE>

              • ch.nolix.element.GUI.Widget<Area,AreaLook>
                • ch.nolix.element.GUI.Area
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, Castable, IFluentObject<Area>, ISmartObject<Area>, Listable<Area>, TypeRequestable, Namable<Area>, Named, OptionalNamable<Area>, OptionalTokenable<Area>, Resettable<Area>, Tokenable<Area>, Tokened, Configurable<Area>, Specifiable<Area>, Specified

    public final class Area
extends Widget<Area,AreaLook>
    A Area is a Widget that: -Has a specific width and height. -Can have a background color.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
